name: Smash Bros. Ironman
description:
This is just a simple Ironman organizer for ALL the current Super Smash Bros. games.  There is no actual game besides the organizer. This game is not a SUBSTITUTION for any Super Smash Bros. game, it is more of a SUPPLEMENTARY that makes Ironman matches less rigid, easier to check what characters have been done, and adds a bit of variety.

I am working on some small updates to customize how Melee, Brawl, Sm4sh, and Ultimate character selects are, so people can play ironman with all characters shown, no mii, miis classes as separate characters, remove miis, and turning echoes off.

NOTE: I AM IN NO WAY AFFILIATED WITH NINTENDO.  THIS WAS MERELY A FUN PROJECT TO WORK ON AND FOR ME TO USE FOR IRONMAN MATCHES ON SMASH ULTIMATE.  IF YOU ARE FROM NINTENDO PLEASE DO NOT SUE.
